gui.vampirism.name_sword.text: Do you want to give this sword a name?
gui.vampirism.taskmaster.text.vampirism_: 很抱歉,如果您願意幫助當地的吸血鬼社區,那麼您可以完成幾項任務。完成後您會得到回報,並給自己起個名字。請瀏覽任務並接受您喜歡的任何東西
資深獵人,為了支持本地獵人社區,您可以完成幾項任務。完成後您將獲得獎勵。請瀏覽可用的任務並接受您喜歡的任何任務。

enchantment.vampirism.vampireslayer.desc: 增加對吸血鬼生物的傷害
enchantment.vampirism.crossbowinfinite.d: 使您（非技術類）的shoot射而無需消耗箭頭
category.vampirism.balance.tooltip: 更改幾乎所有關於平衡系統的事項
category.vampirism.balance_mob_prop.tool: 更變血族傳說增添的怪物屬性

action.vampirism.freeze.desc: 暫時凍結附近的所有實體
action.vampirism.regen.desc: 暫時恢復健康,但消耗更多血液
action.vampirism.summon_bat.desc: 召喚一隻蝙蝠聚集在你周圍,使任何觸碰它的玩家蒙蔽
action.vampirism.teleport.desc: 快速傳送到您正在尋找的地點
action.vampirism.vampire_rage.desc: 在憤怒模式下,您更快,造成的傷害更大,但消耗更多的血
action.vampirism.sunscreen.desc: Grants temporary immunity from direct sundamage with long cooldown.
action.vampirism.disguise_vampire.desc: 暫時偽裝成非吸血鬼來欺騙暴民和玩家
action.vampirism.disguise_hunter.desc: 暫時顯著降低了對暴民和玩家的偵測和可見度範圍。
action.vampirism.dark_blood_projectile.d: 發射會造成傷害的鮮血彈頭
action.vampirism.half_invulnerable.desc: 阻止大筆損失卻使您減速的動作
action.vampirism.awareness_hunter.desc: 感知附近吸血鬼玩家或實體的動作
action.vampirism.potion_resistance_hunte: 移除某些對你不利的藥水效果
action.vampirism.lord_speed.desc: Increases the movement speed of nearby vampires
action.vampirism.lord_attack_speed.desc: Increases the attack speed of nearby vampire
skill.vampirism.stake2: How to Actually use a Stake
skill.vampirism.neonatal_decrease.desc: Decreases the time in your neonatal form
skill.vampirism.blood_vision.desc: 通過黑暗中的牆查看實體. 用按鍵切換.
skill.vampirism.blood_vision_garlic.desc: 另外標識有毒血液的實體
skill.vampirism.advanced_biter.desc: 使您可以更有效地吸血並在適當的時機停止。還會增加您的咬傷。
skill.vampirism.water_resistance.desc: 你的身體不會再被水削弱了
skill.vampirism.blood_charge.desc: Charge your blood using tools on the go by sneak right clicking.
skill.vampirism.sword_finisher.desc: Instantly kill any non-vampire that has below %s percent of their max health using a vampire sword
skill.vampirism.half_invulnerable.desc: Action that temporarily blocks high value damages but consumes blood for that
skill.vampirism.vampire_rage.desc: Action that gives you a speed and damage boost on cost of increased blood usage
skill.vampirism.summon_bats.desc: Summon a lot of bats around you while in bat mode to distract enemies
skill.vampirism.garlic_blood_vision.desc: Allows you to additionally detect entities with poisonous blood
skill.vampirism.enhanced_armor.desc: 解鎖製作增強版的獵人裝甲
skill.vampirism.hunter_attack_speed_adva: 進一步減少攻擊的冷卻時間
skill.vampirism.enhanced_weapons.desc: Allow crafting enhanced weapons including crossbows
skill.vampirism.weapon_table.desc: 了解如何使用獵人鍛造台
skill.vampirism.enhanced_crossbow.desc: 了解如何強化你的十字弓
skill.vampirism.stake1.desc: Instantly kill any vampire that has below %s percent of its max health with a stake
skill.vampirism.stake2.desc_all: Instantly kill any vampire from behind with a stake as long as its max health is below %s
skill.vampirism.stake2.desc_npc: Instantly kill any vampire NPC from behind with a stake as long as its max health is below %s
skill.vampirism.blood_potion_table.desc: 了解如何用吸血鬼血液製作出血藥

skill.vampirism.blood_potion_less_bad.de: 降低獲得負面效果的機會
skill.vampirism.blood_potion_category_hi: 提示您的額外項目可能會產生什麼影響
skill.vampirism.blood_potion_duration.de: 你的身體反應良好使藥水運作時間更長
skill.vampirism.blood_potion_portable_cr: 學習不用血藥釀造台釀造血藥
skill.vampirism.tech_weapons.desc: 了解如何製造一些進階的武器
skill.vampirism.disguise_hunter.desc: 讓你隱藏的怪物，變得遠不如其他玩家可見
skill.vampirism.basic_alchemy.desc: 了解如何使用Alchemical Cauldron來製作精美的東西。
skill.vampirism.garlic_diffuser.desc: 了解如何製作大蒜擴散器以使吸血鬼遠離。
skill.vampirism.purified_garlic.desc: 淨化大蒜以增強其效果。用它增強大蒜擴散器。
skill.vampirism.enhanced_blessing.desc: Your blessings may create more powerful items.
skill.vampirism.garlic_diffuser_improved: 了解如何製作更高範圍的大蒜擴散器
skill.vampirism.multitask_brewing.desc: 立即用藥水錶從5個而不是3個藥水中抽出
skill.vampirism.durable_brewing.desc: 學習昂貴的食譜來釀造非常持久的藥水
skill.vampirism.concentrated_brewing.des: 學習昂貴的食譜來釀造非常濃的藥水
skill.vampirism.crucifix_wielder.desc: Learn how to properly use a crucifix
skill.vampirism.ultimate_crucifix.desc: Allows you to utilize the most holy crucifix
skill.vampirism.fledgling.desc: As a mature vampire you can not only choose to infect other creatures, but also turn into a bat
skill.vampirism.hunter_minion_stats_incr: Increases some stats of your minion
skill.vampirism.vampire_minion_stats_inc: Increases some stats of your minion

skill.vampirism.vampire_minion_collect.d: Send your minions to collect blood
skill.vampirism.minion_recovery.desc: Speeds up the time your minions need to recover
